snippet: Tim Duncan, Tony Parker and Manu Ginobili have provided consistency for the Spurs, who are again on top of the Western Conference.
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan, Tony Parker and Manu Ginobili have provided consistency for the Spurs, who are again on top of the Western Conference.

headline.main: Building on Aging Core, Spurs Refuse to Wither
headline.print_headline: Building on Aging Core, Spurs Refuse to Wither
